name: Abyss (7DRL 2021)
description:
This game is created for 7DRL 2021 https://itch.io/jam/7drl-challenge-2021

Explore the abyss where the dungeon is mysteriously shifting and falling apart. Find treasure and get out while you still can.

(The game is still WIP, but is in a playable state. More content will be added over the next few days)
